caption.p:
Concentration-response curve showing the vasorelaxant effect of EOPh (a) in endothelium-intact and denuded rat mesenteric rings precontracted with phenylephrine (10 μM) and (b) vasorelaxant effect of verapamil (positive control) in rings of mesenteric artery without endothelium precontracted with phenylephrine. Values are mean ± SEM.
∗∗∗
p < 0.001 versus Phe, Student's t-test ( n = 5–7).
